meanings.sent1: The bombinations of the thunder shook the windows.
meanings.sent2: The bombinations of the drums echoed through the hall.
meanings.sent3: The bombinations of the old car horn startled the cat.
meanings.sent4: The bombinations of the waterfall filled the valley with music.
meanings.sent5: The bombinations of the lion's roar echoed across the savannah.

meanings.definition: The act of making a loud, deep, resonant sound.
meanings.sent1: The sudden bombinations of the construction work surprised the neighbors.
meanings.sent2: The bombinations of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The bombinations of the children playing in the park could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent4: The bombinations of the engines signaled the start of the race.
meanings.sent5: The bombinations of the church bells marked the beginning of the ceremony.
